level.heading: Taxation.
level.text: Every society organized or licensed under this chapter is hereby declared to be a charitable and benevolent institution, and all of its funds shall be exempt from all and every state, county, district, municipal and school tax other than taxes on real estate and office equipment.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-86
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 31-5301.
